name: Topogenus
description:
A game by SRPent

A topology and graph theory game based on the Three Utilities Problem
Entry for the Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam :'D

Theme: Holes

Made in about 3 days.

Music:
The Hex by The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org / Steven Ruud
https://opengameart.org/content/the-hex

Win and close path SFX:
8bit SFX by celestialghost8
https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-sfx

You can hold ctrl when clicking to open the game in order to show the resolution dialogue.

Controls

ActionKeyLook around
Mouse movementMoveW, A, S, DDrawLeft clickReset cameraRRemoveLeft shift + Left clickClean pathSpacebarShow/Hide deformation menuTAB
